comments.author: hosemary
comments.body: I don't have any information about metaverse, but whatever your project is, you are probably launching a token/coin.If it's a coin, post your topic on "Announcements (Altcoins)" and if it's a token, post your topic on its child board, "Tokens (Altcoins)".

comments.author: coupable
comments.body: You cannot be directed to a specific section because the concept of Metaverse is a comprehensive concept and may consist of several different elements, each of which is discussed in a dedicated section. Can you tell us if your project has its own token and in what field will your Metaverse project be activated?It is likely that you are still in the development phase, so you can publish the topic in detail in the "Project and Development" section before thinking about publishing the official announcement.

OP should make his/her topic in "Alternate cryptocurrencies" section.From Guidelines for threads:Quote from: mprep on July 21, 2014, 05:27:51 PMProject Development - Organization of Bitcoin and related projects (sites, software not yet developed/in development), bounty campaigns, advertising etc. No hiring here although "looking for partners" threads should be here.

comments.body: This is an interesting way to advertise your project while trying to stay within the forum rules for posting in this section. The discussion here really shouldn’t be about the project, and a link to it isn’t really appropriate in my opinion. It should probably be locked.
